job_description: Quality Engineer - job post BCVS Group Inc. 1 14th St, San Diego, CA 92101 From $30 an hour -  Full-time, Contract Apply now Apply now save-icon Job details Salary From $30 an hour Job Type Full-time Contract Hello, We are hiring candidates for the Quality Assurance Engineer job role. A Quality Assurance Engineer assures products, processes, and quality records conform to quality standards and establishes compliance with the quality system. Job Responsibilities : Responsible for implementing and maintaining the effectiveness of the quality system. Demonstrated writing and communication skills are required for this position. A thorough understanding of the ISO/QSRs and the ability to apply that knowledge with an understanding of business operations to achieve regulatory compliance are needed. Execute and provide on-time completion of Quality Assurance (QA) engineering deliverables. Maintains awareness of standards that regulate our industry. Support Global CAPA team with training, CAPA oversight, and CAPA deliverables. Support decision-making and oversight of the quality systems, including CAPA (Corrective and Preventive Action) systems. Support key stakeholders with developing and maintaining QA procedures, forms, and systems. Support QA system training. Seeks out information with direction and is able to support other members of the organization on QA practices. As appropriate, participates in the completion of risk assessment, as related to QA systems. General Qualifications : Bachelor/Masters level degree in Engineering, Technical Field, or equivalent (advanced degree preferred) 1+years technical experience Previous Quality assurance/engineering experience preferred Thanks & RegardsHello, We are hiring candidates for the Quality Assurance Engineer job role.
